lead_paragraph: Viewership for the Patriots’ overtime victory over the Falcons was down slightly from last year’s game, capping a troubling yearlong trend for the N.F.L.
snippet: Viewership for the Patriots’ overtime victory over the Falcons was down slightly from last year’s game, capping a troubling yearlong trend for the N.F.L....

headline.main: Super Bowl Delivers Thrills, but No Ratings Record
headline.print_headline: Patriots’ Super Bowl Victory Features a Big Comeback, Just Not for N.F.L. Ratings
